Package dev.relismdev.playlegendquests.utils

Class msg

java.lang.Object
dev.relismdev.playlegendquests.utils.msg
public class msg extends Object
Utility class for handling messaging functionalities within the plugin.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final char
    COLOR_CHAR
    Represents the color character used in Minecraft chat formatting.
    static final Pattern
    HEX_PATTERN
    Regular expression pattern to match hexadecimal color codes in the format #XXXXXX.

  • Method Details

    • send

      public static void send(org.bukkit.entity.Player p, String message)
      Sends a color-translated and placeholder-parsed message to a specific player.
      Parameters:
      p - The player to whom the message will be sent.
      message - The message to be sent.

    • broadcast

      public static void broadcast(String message)
      Sends a color-translated message to all players on the server.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be broadcasted.

    • debug

      public static void debug(String message)
      Sends a color-translated debug message to the console if the debug configuration is enabled.
      Parameters:
      message - The debug message to be sent.

    • log

      public static void log(String message)
      Sends a color-translated message to the console.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be logged in the console.

    • translateColorCodes

      public static String translateColorCodes(String text)
      Translates color codes in the provided text using the vanilla minecraft color code identifier. It also supports hexadecimal color codes (#XXXXXX format).
      Parameters:
      text - The text containing color codes to be translated.
      Returns:
      The text with translated color codes.
